tmr-desc: A RESTful CRUD for tasks, made with React and PrimeReact for the frontend and Java, Spring Boot and MySQL for the backend
pride-month-desc: A pride month website made for a school project
minigames-desc: A minigames collection made in Swing
calculator-desc: A simple calculator made in Swing
orbit-simulator-desc: An orbit physics simulator made in Godot
test-game-desc: A simple test game made in Godot
